org.universAAL.middleware.rdf

Class ScopedResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.universAAL.middleware.rdf.Resource
      • org.universAAL.middleware.rdf.FinalizedResource
        • org.universAAL.middleware.rdf.ScopedResource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContextEvent, ServiceCall, ServiceRequest, ServiceResponse, UIRequest, UIResponse

    public class ScopedResource
extends FinalizedResource
    A ScopedResource is a Resource that may have been generated at, or be sent to, another AALSpace. Thus it can be annotated with one or more Scopes (a.k.a tenant ID, origin AALSpace Id).
    Author:
    amedrano, Carsten Stockloew

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ONLY_LOCAL_SCOPE
      A special scope indicating the Resource may not be serialized to other AALSpaces.

      The property URI for holding the Origin Scope.
      static String PROP_SCOPES
      The property URI for holding the Destination Scopes.

    • Field Detail

      • PROP_SCOPES

        public static final String PROP_SCOPES
        The property URI for holding the Destination Scopes.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROP_ORIG_SCOPE

        public static final String PROP_ORIG_SCOPE
        The property URI for holding the Origin Scope. This property is to be used directly by Resource.getProperty(String) and Resource.setProperty(String, Object), only by the router artifacts.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ONLY_LOCAL_SCOPE

        public static final String ONLY_LOCAL_SCOPE
        A special scope indicating the Resource may not be serialized to other AALSpaces.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • isScoped

        public boolean isScoped()
        Check if there is any scopes for this resource. This includes ONLY_LOCAL_SCOPE.
        Returns:
        true if there is one or more scopes annotated for this resource.

      • getScopes

        public List getScopes()
        List all scopes associated to this resource.
        Returns:
        always a list, empty if there are no scopes.

      • addScope

        public boolean addScope(String newScope)
        Add a new scope to this resource.
        Parameters:
        newScope - the new scope to be added
        Returns:
        whether the change was successful or not.

      • clearScopes

        public boolean clearScopes()
        Remove all scope annotations from this resource. If the Resource is being sent and the scopes are cleared it is assumed that it has to be sent to all available Scopes.
        Returns:
        iff the scopes have been cleared.

      • setScope

        public boolean setScope(ScopedResource src)
        Copy the scope from another ScopedResource.
        Parameters:
        src - the source from which to copy the scope.
        Returns:
        whether the change was successful or not.

      • isSerializableTo

        public boolean isSerializableTo(String destinationCandidateScope)
        Check whether if this ScopedResource may be sent to a destination scope
        • Deny if the origin is the destination candidate (this will cause message loops)
        • Deny if the destinations do contain ONLY_LOCAL_SCOPE (tenant-aware application has decided this message is only local)
        • Deny if the destinations are not empty and do not contain the candidate destination
        • Allow if the destinations are empty (non-tenant-aware application has generated the message)
        • Allow if the destinations are not empty and contains the candidate destination.
        Parameters:
        destinationCandidateScope - The destination to be checked, If null returns false.
        Returns:
        true iff it may be sent according to origin / destination restrictions.

      • getOriginScope

        public String getOriginScope()
        Get the Scope of the original AALSpace sender of this ScopedResource. To be used only by Gateways!
        Returns:
        The scoped assiged usig setOriginScope(String).

      • setOriginScope

        public void setOriginScope(String scope)
        Set the Origin Scope of an incoming ScopedResource. To be used by Gateways! To reset, use with scope = null.
        Parameters:
        scope - The Scope ID.
